Token.Abstract: The ICSRGB category adds easy UIColor instance creation given RGB and RGBA values.
Returns a color created with the given RGB components. The alpha component of the new color is set to 1.0.

Parameter.Name: rgbValues
Parameter.Abstract: The RGB components of the new color.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A color created with the given RGB components.

Token.Abstract: Returns a color created with the given RGB and alpha components.

Parameter.Name: rgbValues
Parameter.Abstract: The RGB components of the new color.

Parameter.Name: alpha
Parameter.Abstract: The alpha component of the new color.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A color created with the given RGB and alpha components.

Token.Abstract: Returns a color created with the given RGBA components. This is equivalent to calling ics_colorWithRGBValues:alpha: and passing rgbaValues.a as alpha parameter.

Parameter.Name: rgbaValues
Parameter.Abstract: The RGBA components of the new color.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A color created with the given RGBA components.
